author: Hanif A
comment: Anyone who votes less than 5, is ridiculous! It's exactly what you need for a simple coin toss or dice roll. Quick, clear and ad-free.

author: Antonio Suarez
comment: Hey guys, exception founded. :v When I try to pick from an empty list I think I'm trying parse the void string "" or whatever. Great app!

author: Dylan Lackey
comment: The only thing I could think to add would be the ability to roll multiple dice at the same time instead of rolling say 3 individual dice.
title: Awesome tool for tabletop RPGs.

author: Drew Smuniewski
comment: This app really helps when you don't have dice or coins but need to settle something.
title: Amazing App

author: Jay Creamer
comment: Compared to other apps like this, this one is quite polished.
title: Polished

author: Andrew Schwartz
comment: Beautiful animations. Amazing instance of material design in a functional and useful app
title: Beautiful and useful

author: Robert Wilhite
comment: Great app for trying new pizza combinations. Double bacon and basil pesto coming right up. ... Be sure to clear out the demo list items, or you'll end up with "pepperoni mushroom and Jupiter" combo - which didn't taste too bad, but the delivery took FOREVER.
title: Pizza toppings!

author: Sherry Glaab
comment: Had to download it on my other phone because I liked it so much.
title: Fun, Free Coin Flip / Dice App

author: sherry glaab
comment: This app is a customizable randomizer. You can use it to flip a coin, roll dice, or create your own smartphone version of a magic 8 ball (with the customizable pick list). It's easy to use and intuitive, as well as graphically appealing. Best of all, it is free with no ads! Can't beat that! It is also nice that it works on an Android phone, tablet or Android wear (Android watch). Much nicer icons with the recent updates, plus some crash fixes.
title: Flip is fun, useful & entertaining!

author: Bryce Blevins
comment: It is a useful dice roller, and I like how it is is set up.  I am using it for LEAP Day and it is a good dice roller.  However, sometimes it stops for some reason.  But, good app!
title: It is very useful with Pathfinder

author: Fionn Anderson
comment: More dice options would be nice
